name: Elio Qoshi (@elioqoshi)
content:
Duplicating this from here: mozilla/OpenDesign#84
I thought it would be great to unite for our Open Design Meeting tomorrow :)

We will have our next Open Design Meeting on Vidyo as usual:

Date & Time: Thursday, 11th August 5PM GMT
Duration: 30-45min
Vidyo Room Link: https://v.mozilla.com/flex.html?roomdirect.html&key=NTr7t1TVKnnhKBCVCd74qw8Oo

Agenda/Notes/Questions:
https://public.etherpad-mozilla.org/p/open-design-meeting

Please add your topics or share-outs to the agenda!
The call will be recorded.

name: xmatthewx
content:
Thanks @elioqoshi. How often does this group meet?

cc @lovegushwa

name: Elio Qoshi (@elioqoshi)
content: @xmatthewx Hey! We meet once a month, every 2nd Thursday. If we can make it sustainable we can make it also biweekly.

name: xmatthewx
content: Excellent! I shared info with the team.

name: Elio Qoshi (@elioqoshi)
content: elioqoshi             changed the title from Meeting 11th August 2016 to Open Design Meeting 11th August 2016       Aug 10, 2016
